item.title: 【Helpdesk】Help with download from HotLink
item.description:
Hi.

I have tried to download a file twice (1.6GB) from HotLink using the free download option. However, both attempts failed and cut off after around about eight hours (file takes nine hours to download using the free option) and can only try once per day.

https://hotlink.cc/mnzc9m8assce/VA_...-FLAC-2013_Sony_Music_-_88765413052_.rar.html

If anyone else here has used HotLink, do you get the same problem when downloading from this site? As I've only used that particular site a couple of times.
item.author: OrangeGround35
